author: @marouaneajarroud7296
comment:
I've been a Real Madrid fan for a long time, but in the last two or three years, I've noticed more and more toxic behavior from our own fans toward the players when they're down. It’s not just about Brahim. Even legends like Modrić have been disrespected, and many others before them too.

We're supposed to love and support the club and the players, whether we win or lose. Sadly, we lack this spirit as Madridistas. Look at Barcelona fans. Even during their worst seasons, they stood by their players and their club. Meanwhile, we turn our backs at the smallest inconvenience.

Mistakes happen occasionally, sometimes even every game, but that doesn't mean a player is a loser or a failure. Criticize if you want, but show some respect. Don’t forget Brahim has made us all lose our minds with joy in so many games since he returned from Milan.

Support the team, not just when it's easy, but especially when it's hard. Hala Madrid!
